news.title: Listen to Mariah Carey’s New Song “Type Dangerous”
news.summary: Carey’s first original solo track since 2019 samples Eric B. & Rakim’s “Eric B. Is President”

news.title: Turnstile Release New Album Never Enough: Listen and Read the Full Credits
news.summary: The Baltimore band’s fourth album features Faye Webster, Paramore’s Hayley Williams, Blood Orange’s Devonté Hynes, and others

news.title: Sabrina Carpenter Shares New Song “Manchild”: Listen
news.summary: Jack Antonoff produced the pop singer’s first proper single of 2025
